sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { BookOpen, Calendar, ClipboardEdit, FileCheck, GraduationCap, Settings, UserCog, Users } from 'lucide-react' import Button from '../../components/UI/Button' import Card, { CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../../components/UI/Card' import Progress from '../../components/UI/Progress' import { getStudentDashboard } from '../../services/studentApi' import { toast } from 'react-hot-toast' import ViewMentorEvaluation from '../../components/student/ViewMentorEvaluation' import ViewTeacherEvaluation from '../../components/student/ViewTeacherEvaluation' import RegisterInternship from '../../components/student/RegisterInternship' import PreliminaryReportCheck from '../../components/student/PreliminaryReportCheck' import ViewInternshipDuration from '../../components/student/ViewInternshipDuration' import EditProfile from '../../components/student/EditProfile' import SubmitReport from '../../components/student/SubmitReport' const StudentDashboard = () => { const [dashboardData, setDashboardData] = useState({ reportsSubmitted: 0, daysRemaining: 0, overallProgress: 0, recentActivity: [] }) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { const response = await getStudentDashboard() setDashboardData(response.data) } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard data:', error) toast.error('Failed to load dashboard data') } finally { setLoading(false) } } fetchDashboardData() }, []) if (loading) { return (
) } return (
IMS
Dashboard Reports Evaluations
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome back, Student

Here's an overview of your internship progress

{/* Stats Overview */}
Reports Submitted
{dashboardData.reportsSubmitted}
 Days Remaining
{dashboardData.daysRemaining}
 Overall Progress
{dashboardData.overallProgress}%
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{/* Evaluations */}

Evaluations

{/* Internship Status */}

Internship Status

{/* Recent Activity */} {dashboardData.recentActivity && dashboardData.recentActivity.length > 0 && (

Recent Activity

{dashboardData.recentActivity.map((activity, index) => (

{activity.title}

{activity.description}

{new Date(activity.timestamp).toLocaleDateString()}
))}
)}
) } export default StudentDashboard
